promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical bear steel-type pokemon wearing grey armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Desertalon, a a massive mythical bear steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Rusty Claws, Friend Search. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "steel" or "Desertalon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bear-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey galaxy background
generatedDescription: Majestic Desertalon thrives in arid landscapes, using its Rusty Claws to excavate water, while its Friend Search ability connects it to its posse from afar.
